## Description

Provide a summary of the changes and which issue is being addressed.

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update

## Testing Checklist

- [ ] I have verified the code builds without warnings.
- [ ] I have tested the changes in QEMU/Bochs.
- [ ] I have added/updated relevant documentation.
- [ ] I have updated `CREDITS` and `.mailmap` as per the contributing guidelines.
